hive.dispatcher package¶

Submodules¶

hive.dispatcher.dispatcher module¶

class hive.dispatcher.dispatcher.Dispatcher[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A class that computes instructions for the fleet based on a given simulation state.

abstract generate_instructions(simulation_state)[source]¶

Generates instructions for a given simulation state. :type simulation_state: ForwardRef :param simulation_state: :rtype: Tuple[Dispatcher, Tuple[Instruction, …]] :return: the updated Dispatcher along with all instructions for this time step
